title: Killip Classification for Heart Failure
desc: The Killip Classification for Heart Failure quantifies severity of heart failure in NSTEMI and predicts 30-day mortality.

orgreference.text: Killip T, Kimball JT. Treatment of myocardial infarction in a coronary care unit. A two year experience with 250 patients. Am J Cardiol. 1967;20(4):457-64.

data.evidence:
Killip classification:

Class I

No signs of congestion

Class II

S3 and basal rales on auscultation

Class III

Acute pulmonary edema

Class IV

Cardiogenic shock
